## BundleDropModule.setClaimCondition() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Sets public claim conditions for the next minting using the claim condition factory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setClaimCondition(tokenId: BigNumberish, factory: ClaimConditionFactory): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish |  |
|  factory | ClaimConditionFactory | The claim condition factory. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
